marklogic.body:
If our standards of living go down at the rate they are, then liberty is under an even greater threat. To Coalition uncaring attitudes (two for David Davis) you can add the growing calls for shake-ups, clampdowns and more surveillance in the light of last week's student jamboree...and votes heading towards the knuckle-draggers. Some inflation indicators are running at 25% according to this morning's ONS data. This isn't good news on any level.
http://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2010/12/14/Cold-Comfort-for-the-coalition-in-new-economic-feedback/
